thread.section_title: macs4u.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of macs4u.com | www.macs4u.com
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I was uncertain about buying blind online, but at every step Macs4u.com came through exactly as promised, or better. Stupidly, after placing my order, I realized I needed it shipped to a different address, which is not allowed by PayPal for insurance reasons. Macs4u.com staff worked tirelessly to figure out a workaround, and they came up with one that worked! The machine arrived, with used mouse and keyboard, as promised, and it has worked perfectly right out of the box. As it happens, I haven't needed the setup assistance I thought I would (one of the reasons I chose Macs4u.com over others). I rarely write reviews, but then I rarely find an online experience as smooth, professional, and personable as Macs4u.com!
